trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of parameters relevant to an <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"></xref> as well as their respective mappings to columns in a <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>.
This class cannot be inherited.

When using named parameters, the number of parameters in the collection must be equal to the number of named parameters within the command text, or the .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle raises an error.

The .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle does not support the question mark (?) placeholder for passing parameters to an SQL statement called by an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> of `CommandType.Text`.
In this case, named parameters must be used.
For example:
When using named parameters in an SQL statement called by an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> of `CommandType.Text`, you must precede the parameter name with a colon (:).

However, in a stored procedure, or when referring to a named parameter elsewhere in your code (for example, when adding <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter> objects to the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Parameters%2A> property), do not precede the named parameter with a colon (:).
The data provider supplies the colon automatically.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameterCollection"></xref> class.
Adds the specified <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter"></xref> to the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameterCollection"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter"></xref> to add to the collection.
A reference to the new <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter"></xref> object.
The specified in the value parameter is already added to this or another .
The value parameter is null.
Adds the specified <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter"></xref> object to the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameterCollection"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter"></xref> object to add to the collection.
The index of the new <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter"></xref> object in the collection.
Adds an <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter"></xref> to the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameterCollection"></xref> given the parameter name and data type.
The name of the parameter.
One of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleType"></xref> values.
A reference to the new <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter"></xref> object.
Adds an <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter"></xref> to the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameterCollection"></xref> given the parameter name and value.
Use caution when using this overload of the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameterCollection.Add%2A> method to specify integer parameter values.

Because this overload takes a `value` of type <xref:System.Object>, you must convert the integral value to an <xref:System.Object> type when the value is zero, as the following C# example demonstrates.
If you do not perform this conversion, the compiler will assume you are attempting to call the `OracleParameterCollection.Add` (`string`, `OracleType`) overload.
The name of the parameter.
The <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter"></xref> to add to the collection.
A reference to the new <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter"></xref> object.
The value parameter is not an .

Adds an <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter"></xref> to the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameterCollection"></xref> given the parameter name, data type, and column length.
The name of the parameter.
One of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleType"></xref> values.
The length of the column.
A reference to the new <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter"></xref> object.

Adds an <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter"></xref> to the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameterCollection"></xref> given the parameter name, data type, column length, and source column name.
The name of the parameter.
One of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleType"></xref> values.
The length of the column.
The name of the source column.
A reference to the new <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter"></xref> object.
Adds an array of values to the end of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameterCollection"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Array"></xref> values to add.
Adds an array of <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter"></xref> values to the end of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameterCollection"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter"></xref> values to add.
Adds a value to the end of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameterCollection"></xref>.
The name of the parameter.
The value to be added.
A <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter"></xref> object.
Removes all of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter"></xref> objects from the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameterCollection"></xref>.
Determines whether the specified <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter"></xref> is in the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameterCollection"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter"></xref> value.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameterCollection"></xref> contains the value, `false` otherwise.
Determines whether the specified object is in the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameterCollection"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Object"></xref> value.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameterCollection"></xref> contains the value, `false` otherwise.
Indicates whether an <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter"></xref> with the specified name is contained in the collection.
The name of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter"></xref> to look for in the collection.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter"></xref> is in the collection; otherwise, `false`.

Copies all the elements of the current <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameterCollection"></xref> to the specified one-dimensional <xref href="System.Array"></xref> starting at the specified destination <xref href="System.Array"></xref> index.
The one-dimensional <xref href="System.Array"></xref> that is the destination of the elements copied from the current <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameterCollection"></xref>.
A 32-bit integer that represents the index in the <xref href="System.Array"></xref> at which copying begins.

Copies all the elements of the current <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameterCollection"></xref> to the specified <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameterCollection"></xref> starting at the specified destination index.

The <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameterCollection"></xref> that is the destination of the elements copied from the current <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameterCollection"></xref>.
A 32-bit integer that represents the index in the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameterCollection"></xref> at which copying begins.
Returns an Integer containing the number of elements in the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameterCollection"></xref>.
Read-only.
The number of elements in the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameterCollection"></xref> as an Integer.
Returns an enumerator that iterates through the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameterCollection"></xref>.
Exposes the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator%2A> method which supports a simple iteration over a collection by a .NET Framework data provider.
An <xref href="System.Collections.IEnumerator"></xref> that can be used to iterate through the collection.
Gets the location of the specified <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter"></xref> within the collection.
The <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter"></xref> to find.
The zero-based location of the specified <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter"></xref> that is a <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter"></xref> within the collection.
Gets the location of the specified <xref href="System.Object"></xref> within the collection.
The <xref href="System.Object"></xref> to find.
The zero-based location of the specified <xref href="System.Object"></xref> that is a <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter"></xref> within the collection.
Gets the location of the specified <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter"></xref> with the specified name.
The case-sensitive name of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter"></xref> to find.
The zero-based location of the specified <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter"></xref> that is a <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter"></xref> within the collection.
Inserts a <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter"></xref> object into the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameterCollection"></xref> at the specified index.
The zero-based index at which value should be inserted.
A <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter"></xref> object to be inserted in the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameterCollection"></xref>.
Inserts a <xref href="System.Object"></xref> into the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameterCollection"></xref> at the specified index.
The zero-based index at which value should be inserted.
A <xref href="System.Object"></xref> to be inserted in the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameterCollection"></xref>.
Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameterCollection"></xref> has a fixed size.
Returns `true` if the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameterCollection"></xref> has a fixed size, `false` otherwise.
Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameterCollection"></xref> is read-only.
Returns `true` if the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameterCollection"></xref> is read only, `false` otherwise.
Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameterCollection"></xref> is synchronized.
Returns `true` if the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameterCollection"></xref> is synchronized, `false` otherwise.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter"></xref> with the specified name.
The name of the parameter to retrieve.
The <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter"></xref> with the specified name.
The name specified does not exist.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter"></xref> at the specified index.
The zero-based index of the parameter to retrieve.
The <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter"></xref> at the specified index.
The index specified does not exist.
Removes the specified <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter"></xref> object from the collection.
A <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter"></xref> object to remove from the collection.
Removes the specified <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter"></xref> object from the collection.
A <xref href="System.Object"></xref> object to remove from the collection.
Removes the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter"></xref> object at the specified index from the collection.
The zero-based index of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter"></xref> object to remove.
Removes the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter"></xref> object with the specified name from the collection.
The name of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter"></xref> object to remove.
Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameterCollection"></xref>.
An object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameterCollection"></xref>.
